about_the_game:
Garden of Wandering Souls is a Tower Defense game with a roguelite twist, featuring two unique mechanics: path building and tower attack range patterns that resemble puzzles, with narrative and visuals inspired by Indonesia’s Borobudur Temple, the world's largest Buddhist temple.

After death, souls enter The Garden to wait to be purified by the Guardian Daimon. However, chaos in The Garden has caused the emergence of the Deep Rift that threatens to consume the souls forever. Your mission is to build formations of Guardian Daimon towers to purify the souls and create paths to keep them away from the Deep Rift.

Build paths to create your most effective strategy. Design your paths to guide souls away from the Deep Rift while ensuring they pass through the attack range of towers effectively. You can create straight paths, curves, loops, and various other patterns tailored to your strategy.

Arrange tower formations and synergize multiple unique towers. Each tower's attack or effect range has a unique puzzle-like pattern, making tower placement and formation strategy important. Deciding where to place each tower is part of the excitement, and you can synergize these patterns with the paths you build.

Enjoy endless replayability with roguelite elements that empower you with each attempt. The more waves you successfully clear, the stronger you become. Unlock new cards as you complete waves, providing new towers or blessings to enhance your strategy.

  • Unique Tower Attack and Effect Range: Each tower has unique attack or support skills and puzzle-like area patterns.

  • Random Draw: Receive random cards each turn, adding unique challenges to every playthrough. You can use, save, or discard them.

  • Save Cards: If a card isn't useful for the current turn, save up to three cards for future use and purchase new ones.

  • Boss Fights: Face off against extremely powerful corrupted souls that appear as powerful bosses at the end of each level's wave.

  • Unlock New Cards: Earn new cards after reaching certain waves to strengthen your arsenal in your current or future playthrough.

  • Blessings and Card Shop: Acquire blessings that provide permanent effects for that playthrough and manage your gold to purchase new towers in the shop.

  • Procedurally Generated Maps: Maps are automatically generated for each playthrough. You can destroy obstacles using explosive orbs, and expand the Garden using tile orbs.
